import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import {Button, Col, Form, FormControl, InputGroup, Modal, Table} from "react-bootstrap"; import './PopupAfegirDiners.css'; import useDiners from "../Servicio/Servei_Diners"; export default function PopupAfegirMenu () { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const [Saldo, setSaldo] = useState(null); useEffect(() =>{},[]) const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => { setShow(true); setSaldo(null); } const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); handleClose(); } const handleChange = ({target}) => { const {name, value} = target console.log(value) if (value != null){ setSaldo(parseInt(value)) }else { setSaldo(parseInt(0)) } } return ( <> Afegir Menu Afegeix un Men√∫
Data Primer Segon Postre Preu Tipus
); }
